Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[SimpleModChec: Enable or disable the Main Menu notification.
Options.OPTION[SimpleModChecker.SimpleMo: Auto delete Mods with Missing CIDs?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[SimpleModChec: Enable or disable the automatic deletion of mods with missing CIDs.
Enable or disable the automatic deletion of corrupted settings.
Options.OPTION[SimpleModChecker.SimpleMo: Auto enable Auto save on Settings Crash?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[SimpleModChec: Enable or disable the automatic activation of autosave in the event of accidental game settings reset.
Options.OPTION[SimpleModChecker.SimpleMo: Auto disable Radio on Settings Crash?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[SimpleModChec: Enable or disable the automatic deactivation of radio in the event of accidental game settings reset.
